Posts.Content: I was diagnose with mestatic breast cancer 3 weeks was suppose to start chemo 2 days when I went found out results of tests now i am told i have a spot on one of my lungs but also have portal caval lymph node enlarged Now I have pet scan in 2 days for the lymph node and lung doctor appointment in 2 days also. I am so scared. has anyone else had this.
Posts.Title: multiple cancers
